item.title: Fix ERR_CERT_AUTHORITY_INVALID error python clients get while proxying. Mitmproxy
item.description: You may find out as me that after proper setting Mitmproxy up python https requests end up with ERR_CERT_AUTHORITY_INVALID error while other http clients are working with no problems. Quite unexpectable, isn't it?
